meanings.definition: A comprehensive treatise on astronomy by Ptolemy.
meanings.sent1: The almagest by Ptolemy explained the movements of stars and planets.
meanings.sent2: Many astronomers refer to the almagest as a crucial text in the history of astronomy.
meanings.sent3: Reading the almagest felt like taking a journey through the vastness of space.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the almagest was a guiding light in her astronomical studies.
meanings.sent5: The almagest painted a detailed picture of the celestial bodies in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A work of great authority or importance in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: In the field of medicine, his research was considered the almagest of modern times.
meanings.sent2: The almagest of literature in that era was a book that everyone referenced.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the almagest of cooking recipes, she felt like a master chef.
meanings.sent4: His words were like the almagest of wisdom, guiding people through difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The almagest of fashion magazines was her go-to guide for the latest trends.
